roleset.name: collapse
roleset.note: CAVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cave' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from cave.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: shortened from cave in?
example.text: When it threatened to use this provision as the test for a line-item veto, Congress caved.
example.arg: When it threatened to use this provision as the test for a line-item veto

example.name: with CAU
example.text: You have a right to live your own life and be happy , so *PRO* do n't cave to his threats .

example.name: typical usage
example.text: That was the question structural engineers and California transportation officials were asking themselves yesterday as rescue workers began the gruesome task of trying to extract as many as 250 victims from beneath the concrete slabs of the double-deck Nimitz Freeway in Oakland that [*T*] caved in during Tuesday's temblor.
